\define close-title() ]] <$set name=currentTab filter="""[split[|]nth[2]]"""> <$set name=currentTiddler value=<> emptyValue=<> > <$wikify name=currentTab text="""<>"""> <$set name=tagname value={{{ [split[tag: ]last[]] }}} > <> Your tiddlers tagged <$macrocall $name=tag tag=<>/>
<$list filter="[tagsort[]]"> {{||$:/core/ui/Buttons/edit}} <$link/>
title: tag: tagname
caption: {{$:/core/images/tag-button}} {{{ [<currentTab>split[tag: ]last[]] }}}
